description: True sadism is a trait not often found in most people - however, it is Maitresse Madeline’s defining feature. Nothing is safe, or sacred in Maitresse Madeline’s dungeon… Throughout the entire scene somehow, for some reason - her ward’s pussy is a constant dribble of juice. Maitresse uses this longing within her slave, and in response just keeps adding to the punishment…
title: Maligned Mistress (Part 1 of 2)
